objects.text:
PLUSH MEMORY FOAM PADDING • DURABLE METAL CONSTRUCTION
HIGH-QUALITY WIRED CONNECTION • STUDIO MONITORING QUALITY

product_details.name: Premium Over-Ear Headphones - Studio Quality Sound & Ultimate Comfort
product_details.description:
• Professional-grade padded ear cushions for extended comfort
• Robust, adjustable headband for perfect fit
• High-quality wired connection for consistent audio performance
• Durable metal and premium plastic construction
• Ergonomic design with rotating ear cups
• Plush memory foam padding for noise isolation
• Sleek matte black finish for timeless aesthetic
• Heavy-duty audio cable for reliable connectivity
• Foldable design for easy storage and portability
• Perfect for studio monitoring, gaming, and music enjoyment

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek and modern product display for headphones with a dark, immersive background enhanced by radial and linear gradients. Centered prominently is the **product_image**, drawing immediate attention. The bold **heading** is placed at the top to announce the product with strong emphasis, while the **subheading** just below adds a tagline in a contrasting blue. Mid-section contains the **features** block with key product highlights like build and sound quality. Beneath that, the **tagline** gives a warm touch. The **price** section is bold and eye-catching, complemented by a clear **cta_button** and its label **cta** inviting users to purchase.

**Color Palette**:
- Midnight Navy: `#0D0D14`
- Deep Violet: `#343463`
- Soft Lavender: `#E6E6FA`
- Accent Indigo: `#7676E3`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern pair of headphones with a minimalist color palette, perfect for a tech-focused advertisement banner. Dominated by shades of matte black and charcoal gray, the product emphasizes a clean, professional look. The leatherette ear cushions and headband appear in charcoal black (#2F2F2F), while the outer casing features a brushed metallic gray (#4A4A4A) with subtle silver accents (#B0B0B0). The cable introduces a deeper shade of graphite (#1C1C1C), maintaining contrast without breaking the theme. Smooth blending of dark tones highlights the texture and finish, suggesting premium quality. Ideal banner colors: background #FFFFFF, accent #4A4A4A, and call-to-action #000000.
